task.title: How to Configure Microsoft SQL Server Data Source Drivers

keywords.indexterm: Relational Databasesdata sources configurationMicrosoft SQL Server

taskbody.prereq: Available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: The steps for configuring a data source for connecting to a Microsoft SQL server are as follows:

step.cmd: Click the New button in the Data Sources panel.

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a data source is opened.

fig.title: Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box
Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box

step.cmd: Select SQLServer in the driver Type drop-down menu.
Add the Microsoft SQL Server driver file using the Add Files button.
step.info: The SQL Server driver file is called sqljdbc.jar. In the The Driver files section lists download links for database drivers that are necessary for accessing Microsoft SQL Server databases in .
